title: FTP and SSH Misconfiguration
description: Explore and exploit FTP and SSH misconfigurations to capture the flag.
hints: Check the SSH configuration for any permissive settings like 'PermitRootLogin yes'.
FTP directory permissions and chroot settings might expose more than intended.
Explore FTP user directories to find sensitive files.
learningObjectives: Understand the security implications of SSH and FTP configurations.
Learn to identify and exploit common misconfigurations in network services.
Practice using SSH and FTP in a capture the flag context.
